modName: Imperial Rubble Black Wood Vertex Color Fix
summary: Fixes the very dark wood on the imperial exterior rubble by changing the vertex color to FFFFFFFF
descriptionHtml:
Fixes the very dark wood on the imperial exterior rubble by changing the vertex color to FFFFFFFF.

Many vertices on the meshes had 717171ff set as their vertex color. while this works well to get some slight fake ambient ocllusion/indirect lighting improvement on all the stone parts of the structure, it looks horrible and makes no sense the way it is placed on the wooden parts. therefor the wooden parts no are rid of this.

See screenshots for details

Built using the (2.0.3) USKP files.
author: Gruftlord

files.name: Imperial Rubble Black Wood Fix
files.changelogHtml:
Added Ice covered Rubble
Added Ceiling Rubble
Added changes identical to "no Stretching" mod: Texture density improved on Stony Ground for higher Resolution
Added non wood Rubble with UV fix (see above)

files.name: Imperial Rubble Black Wood Fix
files.changelogHtml: Removed all stretching changes from version 1.1. only the Ice covered rubbles' wood fix remains. while the UV fixes help to make the texture look less blurry, the overall aesthetic was changed too much.

files.name: Imperial Rubble Black Wood Fix
files.changelogHtml: Fixed stretched UV on rocks of impextrubble03 and impexticerubble03
